description: Supercreator is a mobile app that uses artificial intelligence to make it easy and quick to create original short videos fast for TikTok, Reels, Shorts, and more.
title: Create videos 10x faster with AI
introduction: Supercreator is a video creation platform that leverages artificial intelligence to simplify the video creation process. It offers a range of features for ideation, editing, capturing, and posting videos, making it easy for users to create high-quality content quickly.
features: Convert articles, Twitter threads, and YouTube videos to scripts
Import and create scripts from scratch
Advanced captions and auto-placement of relevant titles
Smart trim empty pauses and super edit features
Add overlay images, texts, and templates
Adjustable teleprompter and dynamic green screen
AR filters, text-to-filter, and voice-controlled camera
Export videos in various formats to favorite platforms
Algorithm improvement with every video and automatic generation of tailored hashtags, captions, and titles
targetPeople: Content creators, marketers, business owners, and individuals looking to create short form videos quickly and efficiently

faqs.answer: Supercreator is a video creation platform that uses AI to simplify the video creation process.
